page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I get up around seven o'clock and get dressed.Then I go downstairs to the bathroom and have a good wash to wake me up.Afterwards I have{breakfast which consists of Frosties or Ready Brek.It is always rushed at breakfast with people coming in and out. Eventually I go upstairs and get my school things ready and clean my shoes.I then go to{school}at 8.30 in the car calling at the Pub for a paper on the way since we don't have a newsagent in the village.I arrive at school at about 8.35 and put my homework in my desk.The bell rings at 9.00 and we have{assembly.}After assembly we have maths until break at 10.30.We do English after break until lunch at 12.15.Lunch finishes at 1.20 and we then do our project until 2.30.We then go outside to play for fifteen minutes and spend the last
